mapper.sql: type, phone, name, receivetime, content, customid, ucid, createman, createdate, cate
mapper.update:
update
set type=#{type}, phone=#{phone}, name=#{name}, receivetime=#{receivetime}, content=#{content}, customid=#{customid}, ucid=#{ucid}, createman=#{createman}, createdate=now(), cate=#{cate} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select a.id, a.type, a.phone, a.name, a.receivetime, a.content, a.customid, a.ucid, a.createman, a.createdate, c.zxxm as createmanName, b.NAME as typename, d.name as customName, a.cate from a left join SYS_DICTIONARIES b on a.type=b.DICTIONARIES_ID left join tzxlb c on a.createman=c.id left join t_vipinfo d on a.customid=d.id where a.id = #{id}
select * from t_pk_record a where 1=1 and a.uid = #{uid} and a.ucid=#{ucid}
